summary: Diamond Select Announces Captain Marvel Minimates Line Exclusive To Walgreens
title: Diamond Select Announces Captain Marvel Minimates Line Exclusive To Walgreens
body:
Diamond Select Announces Captain Marvel Minimates Line Exclusive To Walgreens

The demise of Toys ‘R’ Us has created quite the power vacuum in the collectible space and various retailers have stepped in to fill the vacuum including the very unexpected Walgreens. Walgreens has become one of the go to destinations for collectibles as of late with their retailer exclusives.

Diamond is strengthening Walgreens collectible footprint with an exclusive wave of Captain Marvel…

View On WordPress

tags: hi ill probably stop quoting this when I die its nbd
this quote makes me so emotional its stupid
summary: I need to find that again. Like taking a car out into the desert to see how fast it can go, I need to find the edge of me… And...
caption:
I need to find that again. Like taking a car out into the desert to see how fast it can go, I need to find the edge of me… And maybe, if I fly far enough, I’ll be able to turn around and look at the world… And see where I belong.
Captain Marvel Volume 8 Issue #1

reblog.comment:
I need to find that again. Like taking a car out into the desert to see how fast it can go, I need to find the edge of me… And maybe, if I fly far enough, I’ll be able to turn around and look at the world… And see where I belong.
Captain Marvel Volume 8 Issue #1

Captain Marvel Volume 8 Issue #1

summary: Captain Marvel - La copertina ufficiale di Empire Magazine
title: Captain Marvel - La copertina ufficiale di Empire Magazine
body:
Captain Marvel – La copertina ufficiale di Empire Magazine

Come preannunciato solo qualche giorno fa, nella giornata odierna Empire Magazine ha svelato la copertina ufficiale del prossimo numero dedicato a Captain Marvel.

Nel weekend era stata rilasciata la copertina dedicata agli abbonati, la potete trovare all’interno di questo nostro articolo.

Captain Marvel è diretto da Anna Boden e Ryan Fleck. La sceneggiatura è di Ginevra Robertson-Dworet

View On WordPress

summary: The first super hero comics “Spider Man” was a mugger in a furry suit with a bag of goo--Whiz Comics #89, September 1947;...
caption: The first super hero comics “Spider Man” was a mugger in a furry suit with a bag of goo–Whiz Comics #89, September 1947; Captain Marvel finishes him and his pet tarantula (;_;) in one panel at the end of the story “The Webs of Crime.” Otto Binder script, C. C. Beck pencils, Pete Costanza inks.

reblog.comment: The first super hero comics “Spider Man” was a mugger in a furry suit with a bag of goo–Whiz Comics #89, September 1947; Captain Marvel finishes him and his pet tarantula (;_;) in one panel at the end of the story “The Webs of Crime.” Otto Binder script, C. C. Beck pencils, Pete Costanza inks.

trail.content_raw: The first super hero comics “Spider Man” was a mugger in a furry suit with a bag of goo–Whiz Comics #89, September 1947; Captain Marvel finishes him and his pet tarantula (;_;) in one panel at the end of the story “The Webs of Crime.” Otto Binder script, C. C. Beck pencils, Pete Costanza inks.
trail.content: The first super hero comics “Spider Man” was a mugger in a furry suit with a bag of goo–Whiz Comics #89, September 1947; Captain Marvel finishes him and his pet tarantula (;_;) in one panel at the end of the story “The Webs of Crime.” Otto Binder script, C. C. Beck pencils, Pete Costanza inks.

summary: Captain Marvel Features On Empire Magazine's March Cover For Subscribers
title: Captain Marvel Features On Empire Magazine's March Cover For Subscribers
body:
Captain Marvel Features On Empire Magazine’s March Cover For Subscribers

Film magazine Empire has revealed their newest subscriber-exclusive cover for their March edition and it features Captain Marvel by graphic designer Doaly. And it looks pretty darn great.

If you’re interested, why not pop over to Empire to sign up for a subscription. They’ve done some pretty outstanding cinematic superhero covers in the past, as you can see from some of the ones we’ve dug up.

View On WordPress

summary: Batman! Captain Marvel! Freedom Fighters! "Four-Color Bullet" Welcomes 2019!
title: Batman! Captain Marvel! Freedom Fighters! "Four-Color Bullet" Welcomes 2019!
body:
Batman! Captain Marvel! Freedom Fighters! “Four-Color Bullet” Welcomes 2019!

Depending on your particular area of fandom, a Phoenix can be many things: Jean Gray, Laura Murdoch Collins, G-Force’s Main ship, Bennu, a Federation starship, Needle, Hououmon, Fenghuang, Fawkes, Tom Kirkman’s codename, and so on.  I say all that to say this:

Hey, Everybody!  Welcome to the first edition of “Four-Color Bullet!” 2019!  I hope you’ve all enjoyed the holiday season and were…

summary: Captain Marvel: Brie Larson, Jude Law e Ben Mendelsohn sulla copertina di Empire
title: Captain Marvel: Brie Larson, Jude Law e Ben Mendelsohn sulla copertina di Empire
body:
Captain Marvel: Brie Larson, Jude Law e Ben Mendelsohn sulla copertina di Empire

Prima che la Carol Danvers di Brie Larson possa volare e sparare raggi dalle mani nei cinema di tutto il mondo in Captain Marvel in circa due mesi, deve prima vincere al gioco del marketing. E parte di questo comporta vedere la tua faccia su una rivista o due, come ci ha mostrato il nuovo numero di Empire Magazine.

La copertina per tutti di Empire Magazine, proprio come un altro numero recente, è…

summary: This Captain Marvel cover of the upcoming issue of @EmpireMagazine has been revealed. Two just-released official stills offer...
body: This Captain Marvel cover of the upcoming issue of @EmpireMagazine has been revealed. Two just-released official stills offer new looks at the villainous Skrull leader Talos and two members of the Starforce squad.
